org.modelio.vcore.smkernel.meta.smannotations

Annotation Type SmaMetaClass


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface SmaMetaClass
    Annotations for a metaclass.

    The supported fields must match the tags supported by the SemGen module for the <<Semantic>> stereotype on classes.

    Semantic tag Annotation field SmDirective literalDescription
    cmsnode cmsnode CMSNODEindicates that the metaclass is a CMS node
    Author:
    phv

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      Class<? extends ISmObjectFactory> factory
      The instance factory.
      Class<? extends MObject> mmClass
      The interface implemented by all elements of this metaclass.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean cmsnode
      Indicates that the meta class represents a CMS node.
      boolean eispecial
      Special behavior on import/export.
      boolean loadallinstance
      All metaclass instances should be loaded.
      boolean noreadonly
      No read only check.

    • Element Detail

      • mmClass

        public abstract Class<? extends MObject> mmClass
        The interface implemented by all elements of this metaclass.
        Returns:

      • factory

        public abstract Class<? extends ISmObjectFactory> factory
        The instance factory.

      • cmsnode

        public abstract boolean cmsnode
        Indicates that the meta class represents a CMS node.
        Default:
        false

      • eispecial

        public abstract boolean eispecial
        Special behavior on import/export.
        Default:
        false

      • loadallinstance

        public abstract boolean loadallinstance
        All metaclass instances should be loaded.
        Default:
        false

      • noreadonly

        public abstract boolean noreadonly
        No read only check.
        Default:
        false
